title: 42. Your Doctor Has to Go Home. Now What?
description: When a doctor’s shift ends, or a physician retires, are patients left in the lurch? Bapu Jena looks at the challenge of managing medical transitions.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: When a doctor’s shift ends, or a physician retires, are patients left in the lurch? Bapu Jena looks at the challenge of managing medical transitions.
